text: MGR Kazhagam is a political party founded and led by R. M. Veerapan. He is the former Minister under All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam for 5 terms at different periods. MGR Kazhagam which was divided and created from AIADMK supported the DMK alliance in 2004 Lok Sabha elections. ==References== * Category:Political parties in Tamil Nadu
title: MGR Kazhagam
